title: That's dancing!
creator_credit: Jack Haley, David Niven Jr and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: A collection of fifty famous dancers from the world of film, ballet and Broadway are presented in musical sequences ranging from the romantic ballroom dances of Fred Astaire and Ginger Rogers to the electrifying streetgate ballet of “West Side Story”. Highlights the classical brillance of Mikhail Baryshnikov and performances by Busby Berkeley and Michael Jackson.
